insight1.insightSentence: The highest usage of social media platforms is Youtube among 25-29 years old, while the lowest usage is Snapchat among 65+ years old.

subInsights.phrases: lowest usage is Snapchat among 65+ years old

insight2.insightSentence: The usage of Youtube among 18-24 years old is more than twice as much as the usage of Youtube among 65+ years old.

subInsights.phrases: usage of Youtube among 18-24 years old is more than twice as much as the usage of Youtube among 65+ years old

d1: The title of the chart is Use of Social Media Platforms by Age Group in the US.
d2: The x-axis shows the different social media platforms and the y-axis shows the percentage of users in each age group.
